headline: L1 Capital International Fund’s Investment in HCA Healthcare (HCA) Paid Off
summary: L1 Capital, an investment management firm, released its “L1 Capital International Fund” (unhedged) first quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund returned 0.1% (net of fees) in the March quarter surpassing the benchmark return by 2.6% (all in Australian dollars). The Australian dollar appreciated 1.0% against the […]

headline: Conventum-Alluvium Global Fund March 2025 Quarterly Report
summary: For Q1 2025, the Conventum-Alluvium Global Fund was up 1.7% in USD terms and 1.1% in AUD terms. Click here to read the full letter.

headline: HCA Healthcare (NYSE:HCA) Collaborates On Studies To Combat Antibiotic Resistance Nationwide
summary: HCA Healthcare (NYSE:HCA) recently presented significant findings from multi-state studies on antibiotic selection in *JAMA Surgery* and *JAMA Internal Medicine*, with impactful implications for public health and patient care. Over the last quarter, the company's stock price increased by 11%, amidst volatile broader market conditions, like the 4% market drop over one week. Key contributors to HCA's performance likely include the completion of a substantial share repurchase program alongside...
